title: Fresh Salsa
directions: Mix canned and fresh tomatoes together in large bowl, add garlic, onions, and amount of cilantro desired into mixture. Add can of green chiles, and lots of sea salt (or reg, however sea salt would be best for Dad) to taste. Place in refrigerate until cool, and serve with chips.
ingredients: 1 Large can petite diced tomatoes w/ juice
1 med-large sweet onion- finely diced ( or less to taste)
